subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: A conversation with Christian Horner, director of the Red Bull team, which lies second in the series, while its two drivers, Mark Webber and Sebastian Vettel, are third and fourth in the drivers' championship.
snippet: A conversation with Christian Horner, director of the Red Bull team, which lies second in the series, while its two drivers, Mark Webber and Sebastian Vettel, are third and fourth in the drivers' championship.
